description: This recipe makes a large batch of honey and rosemary syrup which will keep in the fridge for a few days so you can make another batch of iced tea.
name: Honey, Rosemary & Orange Iced Tea Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.4 cups English breakfast tea, made with 4 bags, cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Add the honey to a large saucepan and pour over 150ml of water. Bring to the boil, cook for 1 minute and add the rosemary sprigs. Cook for 2 minutes, remove from the heat and leave for 30 minutes to infuse.
Add 4 tablespoons of rosemary syrup to the cooled tea along with orange juice.
Serve in glasses with ice, rosemary sprigs and orange slices.
